Women & men in uniform make tremendous sacrifices. Too often, they must sacrifice dreams of starting a family. My amendment creates a pilot program giving servicemembers the option of freezing eggs or sperm before deploying to a combat zone #FY20NDAA @ReprodMed @resolveorg
My amendment ensures that as wildfires get worse, equipment is distributed according to risk and need. Thanks to @RepKimSchrier for your leadership on this issue. #FY20NDAA

As the threat of wildfires increases, communities at the greatest risk must have equitable access to firefighting and emergency equipment. Under two federal programs, DoD transfers excess property to the US Forest Service which then provides it to states for use in firefighting.

Yesterday, the House passed @RepDelbene's legislation to better protect communities from future landslides. Having a greater understanding of landslide risks will improve federal preparedness efforts and better protect public infrastructure and communities and save lives.

The 2014 mudslide that killed 43 people in Northwest WA forever changed Oso, Darrington, Arlington & the surrounding community. While Oso has come a long way since 2014, these communities will never forget the tragedy and those who died.
